response.overview: Two sisters, Alice, a recovering drug addict and Pandora, a therapist in training, reach the precipice of their relationship. Over scolding hot tea, Alice reveals that Jack, the man her older sister Pandora is in a relationship with, sexually assaulted her years prior. Jack arrives, and Pandora weaponises the language of therapy, gaslighting her sister into believing that it could never have happened. Alice discovers that Pandora is carrying his child, and victim/victimiser roles within the trauma triangle reverse as Alice snaps into an epiphanyâ€¦
response.title: Safe Space
